bioconda.name: bioconductor-spidermir
bioconda.summary: SpidermiR: An R/Bioconductor package for integrative network analysis with miRNA data

biotools.summary: Aims: i) Facilitate the network open-access data retrieval from GeneMania data, ii) prepare the data with appropriate gene nomenclature, iii) integration of miRNA data in a specific network, iv) provide different standard analyses and v) allow the user to visualize the results. In more detail, the package provides multiple methods for query, prepare and download network data, and the integration with validated and predicted miRNA data, the use of standard analysis and visualization methods.

In more detail, the package provides multiple methods for query, prepare and download network data, and the integration with validated and predicted miRNA data, the use of standard analysis and visualization methods.
